channel.title: Industries on ServiceFolder
channel.description: Recent content in Industries on ServiceFolder

item.title: Pool service software that helps you manage your pool service business and helps for servicing, dispatching, estimating, and scheduling | ServiceFolder
item.description: Home Industries Pool Service Software Pool Service Software: Pool service software for swimming pools and swimming pool automation What is Pool Service software? Pool service software is a type of computer application that automates scheduling, routing, dispatching, invoicing, and customer tracking for swimming pools. It focuses on the unique needs of pool upkeep and features include scheduling, dispatching, reporting, and more. Manage your invoices and collect payments for completed work with a pool service software solution.

item.title: The Handyman Software for Home Maintenance for servicing, dispatching, estimating, and scheduling | ServiceFolder
item.description: Home Industries Handyman Software Handyman Software for Home Maintenance What is Handyman Software? The Handyman Software is a software tool that helps small-scale repair service businesses automate job scheduling and billing. It includes tools such as managing work orders, creating invoices, processing payments, and even connecting with customers. The Handyman Software is a tool that companies use to manage the day-to-day schedule for their crew.

item.title: Contractor software for servicing, dispatching, estimating and scheduling | ServiceFolder
item.description: Home Industries Contractor Software Contractor software for servicing, dispatching, estimating and scheduling What is Contractor Software? Contractor software provides solutions to handyman and contractors and allows them to optimize the management and implementation of the services through automation. Contractor Software for Scheduling and Management Contractor scheduling software is an easy to use tool that integrates with QuickBooks. This is a cost-effective option for companies who want to manage their Contractor installation service and schedule it effectively.

item.title: Electrician software for electrical contractors | ServiceFolder
item.description: Home Industries Electrical Contractor Software Electrician software for electrical contractors What is Electrician Software? Electrician software helps a company streamline their business with efficient scheduling and dispatching electricians. Most importantly, it saves time by making the process of finding qualified electricians easier for employers. What is electrical contractor software? Electrical contractor software provides an all-in-one field management solution. This includes estimating and invoicing templates, time tracking, mileage tracking, payroll integration, invoice generation, and more.

item.title: HVAC software for servicing, dispatching, estimating and scheduling | ServiceFolder
item.description: Home Industries HVAC Software HVAC software for servicing, dispatching, estimating and scheduling What is HVAC Software? HVAC software provides solutions to heating, ventilation and air-conditioning contractors and allows them to optimize the management and implementation of the services through automation. HVAC Software for Scheduling and Management HVAC scheduling software is an easy to use tool that integrates with QuickBooks. This is a cost-effective option for companies who want to manage their HVAC installation service and schedule it effectively.

item.title: Lawn Care Software for servicing, dispatching, estimating, and scheduling | ServiceFolder
item.description: Home Industries Lawn Care Software Lawn Care software for servicing, dispatching, estimating and scheduling What is Lawn Care Software? Lawn Care software provides solutions to landscaping, fertilization and leaf raking techs and allows them to optimize the management and implementation of the services through automation. Why Choose ServiceFolder Software for Lawn Care? ServiceFolder is the field service management software solution for small businesses.

item.title: Servicing, dispatching, estimating and scheduling software for Plumbing business | ServiceFolder
item.description: Home Industries Plumbing Software Servicing, dispatching, estimating and scheduling software for Plumbing business What is Plumbing Software? Plumbing software is a set of tools that automate scheduling, dispatching and billing. This type of software makes it easy for techs to estimate plumbing jobs and bill customers on-site from a mobile tablet (mobile device). It also allows them to communicate with the customer in real time to provide information about what they will be doing, when they will be coming out, etc.

item.title: Tackling Appliance Repair with Appliance Repair Software | ServiceFolder
item.description: Home Industries Appliance Repair Software Tackling Appliance Repair with Appliance Repair Software What is Appliance Repair Software? Appliance service software is a tool that allows businesses to run more efficiently by managing the logistics of their business. With online payment and invoicing, you can offer more convenient options for customers. There are also features that allow management teams to keep an eye on the progress of repairs.
